Params: {3: 'All simulated timelines and spaces will eventually converge here.'}
{3: 'Brilliant meteors streak across the cosmos, and lush rivers silently multiply.'}

{3: 'The gravitational force from between the stars grows stronger as intricate electronic circuits built from machinery extend endlessly into deep space. All sorts of possibilities are being calculated and probed.'}
{3: "Absurd calculations crash like massive waves in the flood of data as time and space transform into new concepts and seemingly crystallize at Nanami's fingertips."}
{3: 'She catches hold of the guiding butterfly.'}
